Review: It has a more famous name. The whole island is the dinosaur island but seeing the Mt.Galintan is probably the back of the dinosaur image. It does not cost you anything. It is free for a stop-over.

Didn't know that it is Mt. Galintan , I was just told that it is a sleeping dinausor island. If you're travelling in a private car, you can make a stopover to get a good view of the island. Amazing as it is, it is...More
The island looks like a dinosaur. Lovely view from the top of the hill facing it. No one misses it for photograph

My friends and I went on trip to Mati, the capital city of the province of Davao Oriental. This was our first and only stopover on our way to the place, for it's known for the view of the "sleeping dinosaur". It's picturesque and simply...More
That's how locals name this place. Is a beautiful spot to stop, enjoy and take some pictures in your way to Davao Oriental, but you don't need to go there on purpose.
On our way to mati city.. we stopped by on the most talkabout sleeping dinosaur for a while.... what u see in this picture is what u get on a real one.. nothing else...
